com.audiofetch.afaudiolib.bll.colleagues

Class SapaController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.audiofetch.afaudiolib.bll.colleagues.base.ControllerBase
      • com.audiofetch.afaudiolib.bll.colleagues.SapaController

  • public class SapaController
extends ControllerBase
    Wraps all the Samsung Professional Audio (SAPA) functionality

    NOTE: THIS IS NOT USED IN THE AUDIOFETCH SDK

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SapaController get(Context activity) 
      int getAudioMode()
      Queries the sapa client for the audio mode and returns it
      int getAudioStatus()
      Returns the waio state, where:

      STATE_DISCOVERING = 0 STATE_PLAYING = 1 STATE_DROPOUT = 2
      int getBufferSize()
      Returns the buffer size from the WAIOService NDK class
      java.lang.String getConnectedApbIp()
      Calls WAIOService::getDeviceIp() in NDK code
      java.lang.String getConnectedApbSerial()
      Returns the apb's serial number
      java.lang.String getDiscoveredApbs()
      Returns the json array as a string of the discovered apbs
      java.lang.String getDiscoveredIps()
      Returns the json array as a string of the discovered ip addresses
      boolean isSapaEnabled()
      Returns true if sapa is enabled in preferences
      static boolean isSapaManufacturer()
      Returns true for ControllerBase.SAPA_MANUF devices
      void onDestroy()
      Should be called in onDestroy
      void pauseSapaAudio()
      Stops sapa client and sets mSapaClient = null

      Sets the host and the channel

      Set the volume level for the SAPA service
      void setShouldStartSapaSession(boolean startSapa)
      Sets whether to start a sapa session
      boolean shouldStartSapaSession()
      Returns true if samsung device and not disabled in system prefs under the key PREF_SAPA_ENABLED (i.e, sapaEnabled)
      boolean startSapaAudio()
      Starts a Sapa Audio Session
      void stopSapaAudio()
      Stops sapa audio and services
